thread.title: Nice hotel at a very good location
thread.title_full: Nice hotel at a very good location - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: sfagoncalves
title: Nice hotel at a very good location
text: I was very pleased with this hotel. All very clean. Excellent location. Very pleasant and quite. Definitely I would stay at this hotel in another trip to London. Family room could be a little bigger, for a family of 4.
